CustomField.description: JSON map of per-rule cost overrides. These values take precedence over the default Cost_Per_Incident__c in Behavior_Pattern_Rule__mdt. Format: {"Stale_Opp_90": 750, "Stale_Case_30": 100}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON map of cost overrides by rule. Example: {"Stale_Opp_90": 750, "Stale_Case_30": 100}
CustomField.label: Cost Override
